name: Gizmek Mikazuchi, the Nuclear Emperor
desc: If a monster(s) is in the Extra Monster Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target 1 face-up monster in the Extra Monster Zone; equip that target to this card (max. 1). If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 monster you control that is equipped to this card. You can only use each effect of "Gizmek Mikazuchi, the Nuclear Emperor" once per turn.
